description:
Danny McBean is the coroner and http://anidb.net/ch88462 [Dorothy]`s father. He`s an accomplice of the http://anidb.net/ch90366 [Duke of Normandy], who was given a task to recover a code cipher hidden in the body of a deceased Kingdom agent.
Dorothy revealed that he used to be a brilliant steam engineer before losing his hand in an accident, and began taking out his anger on everybody around him, including his daughter, which caused her to run away from home.
Source: Wikipedia, edited.
name: Danny McBean
